query:
SELECT 
  'Produtos' as tabela, COUNT(*) as total FROM products
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Estoque', COUNT(*) FROM inventory
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Vendas', COUNT(*) FROM sales
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Fornecedores', COUNT(*) FROM product_suppliers
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Webhooks', COUNT(*) FROM webhook_events;
